sense.def:
Kadar se nekdo premika, gleda ali kaže
towards something or someone
, to počne v smeri nekoga ali nečesa.

seg.quote: He saw his mother running towards him.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
move towards a particular situation
, se bodo določene okoliščine verjetno razvile.

seg.quote: There is a tendency towards inflation.

sense.def:
To have a particular attitude towards something or someone
pomeni imeti določeno stališče do nečesa ali nekoga.

seg.quote: He felt very friendly towards them.

sense.def:
Kadar damo denar
towards something
, prispevamo del denarja, ki je za tisto potreben.

seg.quote: They may give you something towards your housing costs.

sense.def:
Towards the end of a period of time
pomeni tik pred koncem določenega obdobja.

seg.quote: I went to London towards the end of 1977.

sense.def:
Towards a part of a place
pomeni blizu nekega dela določenega kraja.

seg.quote: He was sitting towards the back of the room.
